articles.title: Hyundai set to become first foreign EV maker in Türkiye
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: Hyundai will start producing its newly unveiled product.

articles.title: Beauty Diary: What is ‘whole body deodorant' and do you need it?
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Lume Deodorant has introduced a whole body deodorant, different from traditional deodorants, made for use beyond underarms, and can be used safely stop external odour wherever it shows up. Powered by mandelic acid, a gentle AHA, which is clinically proven to stop odour before it starts and keep working for up to 72 hours.

articles.title: What is ‘whole body deodorant' and do you need it?
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Lume deodorant, a new whole body deodorant, recently launched in Woolworths. Developed by an OB/GYN, Lume is designed to safely eliminate external odor in sensitive areas using mandelic acid, with effects lasting up to 72 hours. It differs from traditional deodorants by targeting the source of odor rather than masking it with fragrance.

articles.title: Night vision? You better believe it
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: The Mini Night Vision Binoculars are introduced as a portable night vision device for outdoor activities. They feature 1080P FHD photo capture, an 850nm infrared illuminator, 10X optical magnification with 4x zoom, and a replaceable battery with a 32GB T card for capturing memories in both daytime and nighttime up to 1,000 feet away. These binoculars aim to enhance hunting, fishing, exploring, camping, and photography experiences.

articles.title: Heinz launches new beans with an interesting twist - 'absolutely delicious'
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a new range of beans in British supermarkets, featuring three flavors: Chilli Black Beanz, Curry Chickpeaz, and Tomato Cannellini Beanz. These bean pouches, inspired by world cuisines, are crafted from natural ingredients, low in sugar, and ready in 90 seconds in the microwave, available at Sainsbury's and Ocado for £2.50 per portion.

articles.title: Japanese student designs ‘smart bra' that unlocks only with boyfriend's fingerprint: 'Only your boyfriend can open'
articles.author: Shweta Singh
articles.summary: ZAWAWORKS, a Japanese content creator, has created a 'smart bra' that uses biometric authentication to unlock, specifically fingerprint recognition. This product aims to prevent cheating by only allowing a partner's fingerprint to open the bra.

articles.title: These 37 TikTok Products Are Actually A Win
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Puracy is launching a stain remover designed for stubborn stains, effective on various substances. Gold Bond introduces a firming neck and chest cream with hyaluronic acid to tighten skin and reduce wrinkles. Eos is launching "Strawberry Acai" lip balm, hydrating lips for 24 hours with cocoa, shea, and avocado butters. The Pink Stuff releases a "Sqeezy" sponge set for removing grease, marker, and grime. Olay introduces Super Serum Body Wash formulated with niacinamide, BHA, collagen peptides, vitamin E, and shea butter for more hydrated, smoother, and brighter skin.

articles.title: NoviSign Digital Signage Introduces Help Center to Streamline User Experience
articles.author: Novi Sign Ltd.
articles.summary: NoviSign Digital Signage has launched its new Help Center, a resource hub providing customers with tutorials, information, and troubleshooting for the NoviSign platform. The Help Center offers step-by-step guides, account management support, technical documentation, and a powerful search bar.

articles.title: ARAMIS Global Ambassador, Dwyane Wade, Celebrates New Fragrance Launch During New York Fashion Week
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: A new £25 fruity fragrance is launched, resembling DKNY's aesthetic. It is promoted as perfect for early autumn.

articles.title: Sony introduces Xperia 10 VII
articles.author: Source Tmava
articles.summary: Sony has unveiled the Xperia 10 VII, its newest mid-range smartphone. The phone features a redesigned rear camera module, a 6.1-inch OLED display, a Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 processor, 8GB of RAM, 128GB of storage and a 5,000mAh battery, It is available in white, turquoise and black, and priced at 449 euros.

articles.title: Honor Unveils the 400 Smart, a Budget-Friendly Smartphone with a Focus on Durability and Artificial Intelligence.
articles.author: Málaga Hoy
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic V5, a foldable device aimed at the entry-level segment. The new product combines mid-range features with a competitive price point, demonstrating the brand's commitment to this market.

articles.title: 33 Affordable Beauty Products Your Wallet Will Love
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Various companies are launching new beauty products. Anua introduces a pore-clearing cleansing oil. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Maybelline introduces Lash Sensational Mascara, and E.l.f launches a tubing mascara. L'Oreal introduces a repairing hair treatment and hair concealer spray. Cosrx launches a repairing essence. Wet n Wild introduces a tinted hydrator. NYX launches an extreme hold eyebrow gel, and E.l.f launches Halo Glow Liquid Filter.

articles.title: These 42 Helpful Products Will Help You Get Stuff Done Even If You're Feeling Extra Lazy
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: John Frieda offers Frizz Ease Dream Curls Air Dry Waves Styling Foam, while SwitchBot introduces a Smart Switch Button Pusher. Jot provides coffee concentrate, and Bruvi launches a coffee maker. Platinum Powerwash presents Dish Spray, and Revlon features a hot air brush. Ilia offers Multi-Stick cream, and Live Tinted introduces the Huestick Corrector.

articles.title: Heinz launches all-new ‘meals' for first time in UK supermarket
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Heinz has launched a new range of 'beans based meals' in UK supermarkets. The brand's new products, with different flavors, are available on shop shelves.

articles.title: Japanese Student Invents Anti-Cheating 'Smart Bra', Says 'Only Your Boyfriend Can Open It'
articles.author: Diksha Modi
articles.summary: ZAWAWORKS unveiled a 'smart bra' that uses fingerprint recognition technology for unlocking. The bra, designed as a playful concept to 'prevent cheating,' requires a partner's fingerprint instead of a clasp or password. This innovative product highlights the potential of biometric technology in fashion and everyday items.

articles.title: Android's biggest feature is also its biggest flaw
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: Google acknowledges compatibility problems between its Pixel 10 phone and Samsung's Galaxy Watch 8. Samsung's Galaxy Watch 8 features updates like Gemini smarts, health and nutrition tracking, and One UI 8 Watch which focuses on improving user experience, potentially resolving these issues.

articles.title: Pixel 9: Magnetic Design & New Features Revealed!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 introduces the Tensor G5 chip, enhancing on-device AI capabilities with features like Magic Cue and real-time voice translation. The device also features Pixelsnap, a magnetic attachment system compatible with MagSafe accessories. Furthermore, the Pixel 10 launches with Android 16, featuring Material 3 Expressive UI and exclusive AI-powered features.

articles.title: High Protein Iced Coffee Is Hitting Shelves Soon—Here's How to Get It
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Bulletproof has launched a new High Protein Iced Coffee, available in Original and Mocha flavors, on its website for $33.99 per 14 oz bag. Each serving contains 12g of whey protein and twice the caffeine of a traditional 8oz cup of coffee, with no artificial flavors or sweeteners. According to Bulletproof's Chief Commercial Officer, the product combines the trends of protein and iced coffee, providing a convenient and functional beverage.

articles.title: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream Bringing Sweet Scoops to Old Town Alexandria
articles.author: French
org: City of Alexandria Department of Planning and Zoning
articles.summary: Van Leeuwen Ice Cream, a company known for its bold flavors and simple ingredients, is opening a new scoop shop at 400 King Street in Alexandria, VA. The shop will offer both classic and vegan ice cream options and will be open daily from 11 a.m. to 11 p.m.

articles.title: Revolutionary square image sensor in iPhone 17: A game-changer for selfies and group photos
articles.author: Aakash Jhaveri
articles.summary: The iPhone 17 series introduces a new square image sensor for its selfie camera, a major hardware innovation. This new sensor allows for wider field of view and enables users to capture photos in either landscape or portrait orientation without needing to rotate the phone. This leads to better group selfies and improved image stabilization.

articles.title: 21 Products Reviewers 'Put Off' Buying For Ages — But Are So Glad They Finally Bought
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: The content presents information on various products, including a pet hair roller, nipple covers, vegan exfoliating body scrub, magnetic shelf, compression gloves, fabric defuzzer, microchip pet feeder, shower spray, Olaplex No. 3, Laneige lip mask, sunlamp, jumpsuit, veggie chopper, collagen sheet mask, sleep mask, Bissell Little Green machine, toenail brace, grooming kit, cold brew maker, jewelry cleaning pen, and lengthening mascara.

articles.title: MyEssayWriter.ai vs PerfectEssayWriter.ai: Finding the Best AI Essay Writer for You
articles.author: Artificial intelligence
articles.summary: MyEssayWriter.ai offers a wide range of tools for writing, checking and improving content like essay writing, abstract generator, research paper writer and more. PerfectEssayWriter.ai focuses on simplicity and speed of writing with features like AI answer generator and topic sentence generator.

articles.title: Microsoft 365 Expiring? Windows 11 Will Now Notify You.
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is embedding subscription services into Windows 11, including a fullscreen 'Second Chance Out of Box Experience' (SCOOBE) to remind users about expiring Microsoft 365 subscriptions. This new feature promotes subscription renewals by displaying usage data. Microsoft is considering expanding this system to promote other subscriptions like Xbox Game Pass.

articles.title: Motorola Folding Phone: Swarovski Edition & Review
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola collaborated with Swarovski to launch The Brilliant Collection, incorporating Swarovski crystals into the Razr and Moto Buds Loop. This partnership signals a shift towards luxury tech accessories and the increasing importance of aesthetics in technology, aiming to provide consumers with an emotional connection to their devices.

articles.title: Discord's screen sharing feature comes to smartphones
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Discord is launching its screen sharing functionality to smartphones. This feature, previously available on laptops and PCs, allows users to share their screens during group calls.

articles.title: Nintendo unveils Animal Crossing-like Pokémon Pokopia and Legends Z-A DLC
articles.summary: The Pokémon Company and Nintendo announced two new titles during a Nintendo Direct presentation: Pokémon Pokopia and Pokémon Legends: Z-A-Mega Dimensions. Pokémon Legends: Z-A-Mega Dimensions will be downloadable content for the new Pokémon Legends: Z-A game.

articles.title: ZTE and Quantis Revolutionize Home Entertainment with Next-Generation 4K AI Smart STB Unveiled at IBC 2025
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: ZTE and Quantis have introduced a next-generation 4K AI Smart Set-Top Box at IBC2025. This STB combines 4K Ultra HD visuals with AI to enhance picture quality, provide intelligent content recommendations, and optimize audio-visual settings. The device is expected to support various streaming services and applications, featuring Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity.

articles.title: Why Are Exosomes Suddenly in All Your Skin and Hair Serums?
articles.summary: Exosomes are being utilized in new skincare and haircare products due to their anti-inflammatory and regenerative properties. These products include scalp serums and sprays containing exosomes designed to promote hair growth by calming inflammation and encouraging the development of hair follicle cells. While many exosome skincare products are steeply priced, they are becoming more prevalent in the beauty industry.

articles.title: 31 Game-Changing Products To Help Future You
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products. Catrice launched the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Levoit is offering a new air purifier with ETL and FCC/CARB certifications. O'Keeffe's has released Working Hands cream.

articles.title: Pixel 8 Pro Review: Still Worth It in 2024?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10 Pro, Pro XL, and standard Pixel 10, focusing on iterative refinement and software optimization with features like Magic Cue. The company is also preparing to release the Pixel Watch 4, emphasizing software improvements and extended battery life to establish a more sustainable upgrade path for wearables.

articles.title: I tried Aldi, Lidl and M&S washing up liquid one was 'just as good' as Fairy
articles.author: Chloe Dobinson
articles.summary: Aldi, Lidl, and M&S washing up liquids are tested and compared against Fairy Liquid regarding price and performance. Aldi's washing up liquid, priced at 65p, is effective and creates plentiful suds. Lidl's washing up liquid, costing 69p, is similar to Aldi's but needs more scrubbing for stains. M&S's washing up liquid, at 75p, has a superior scent but struggles with coffee cup stains.

articles.title: I used Google Lens to identify my weirdest junk drawer items - here's how it did
articles.author: David Gewirtz
articles.summary: Google Lens successfully identified obscure 3D printer parts, including one from Anycubic. This showcases the potential of Google Lens in real-world applications for identifying specific components.

articles.title: Nuki Smart Lock secures your house with a phone app
articles.summary: Nuki launched its Smart Lock, featuring encryption, app-based locking/unlocking, and keypad access. Level Lock Pro offers Apple Home Key and NFC fob options, and both Nuki and Level Lock Pro support 'Matter Over Thread'. Kwikset is launching the 'Halo Select Plus' with a tap-to-unlock feature for Apple users, anticipated to be more affordable than Level Lock Pro.

articles.title: XPeng Plans to Introduce G6 SUV to New Zealand by End of 2025, Competing with Tesla in the Electric SUV Market
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: XPeng is launching its G6 electric SUV in New Zealand, with the first dealership opening in Auckland in late 2024. The G6, a mid-sized electric SUV, aims to compete with models like the Tesla Model Y and BYD Sealion 7, and will be available in standard and long-range versions, although New Zealand specifications might differ from the Australian models.

articles.title: Top 5 Affordable SUVs In India With Digital Key Feature: Hyundai Venue, Kia Seltos, And More
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Hyundai, Kia and Toyota are offering the Digital Key feature in their cars in India. Hyundai Venue, Kia Seltos, Hyundai Creta, Kia Sonet, and Toyota Urban Cruiser Taisor now offer the ability to lock, unlock, and start the car via a smartphone app, enhancing convenience and security for owners. This feature is expanding beyond expensive cars to more affordable models.

articles.title: In the iPhone Air, indicators that Apple is rising up to the foldable challenge
articles.author: Nandagopal Rajan
articles.summary: Apple is internally redesigning the iPhone Air, potentially as a precursor to a foldable smartphone. Design changes include moving internal components to the 'camera plateau' and 3D-printing a custom USB-C port to achieve an ultra-thin form factor. These changes suggest Apple is addressing the challenges of foldable phone design, aiming for a device that is comparable in thickness to existing smartphones when folded.

articles.title: Beauty buffs 'ditch' blush and lipstick for budget-friendly multitasker that does it all
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Rimmel has launched the Multi Tasker Jelly Crush, a budget-friendly blush and lip stain available in four scented shades. This jelly stick offers a hydrating, dewy finish and easy application, rivalling more expensive options.

articles.title: The Boots Welcome Baby Box is the ultimate starter kit for newborns and new mums
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: Boots has launched its first-ever Welcome Baby Box, a curated selection of essential baby products and treats for new mums, worth over £107 but on sale for £35. The box contains 19 products, including 15 full-size items from brands like Child's Farm, Aveeno, Nala's Baby and My Little Coco and is available online at boots.com. Parenting Club members can earn 8 points per £1 spent on their baby shop.

articles.title: Tech Review: SwitchBot's air purifier that doubles as a side table sounds like a dream, but in practice it left me slightly underwhelmed.
articles.author: Kurtis Reid
articles.summary: SwitchBot has launched the Air Purifier Table, a combination air purifier and side table. The product features a HEPA filter, wireless charging pad, lamp, and touch controls, controllable via the SwitchBot app. It retails from £239.99.

articles.title: Bayne's bakery unveils app with loyalty rewards and perks
articles.author: Sandhya Suresh
articles.summary: Bayne's The Family Bakers launched a new mobile app featuring a shop finder, digital loyalty scheme, and referral program, rewarding customers with free items. The app is part of Bayne's broader digital transformation strategy and is available on iOS and Android. To celebrate the launch, Bayne's offered a free Yum Yum to app downloaders in their shops on September 11.

articles.title: 7 Must-Try Nude Lipsticks for Every Mood & Skin Tone!
articles.summary: A new line of nude, transfer-proof lipsticks offers ultra-hydration and a satin matte finish for smooth, comfortable lips. The lipsticks are formulated with avocado oil and Vitamin E for 12-hour hydration and color, providing rich pigment with nourishing oils. A 2-in-1 gloss and color option boasts a 12-hour stay and mega shine payoff, described as hydrating, pigmented, and smudge-proof.

articles.title: Air Jordan 6 x Aleali May 'Millennial Pink' – The Best of the Hue: Where to Buy Now
articles.author: Brian Mazique
articles.summary: Nike's Air Jordan brand collaborated with Aleali May to create the Air Jordan 6 'Millennial Pink' sneaker, featuring a Rust Pink and crimson color combination. The sneaker, even years after its initial release, is still available through resellers and is praised for its unique design and versatility.

articles.title: The rise and rise of K-food – get your fix at these new Korean restaurants
articles.author: Tan Hsueh Yun
articles.summary: Tous Les Jours opened its first store in Singapore in December 2024 and subsequently launched two more stores in 2025, offering Korean-inspired baked goods. Standard Bread launched its first overseas outpost in Singapore at Resorts World Sentosa in July 2024, featuring a range of breads and brunch items. Several other Korean food businesses, including Gochu (opening mid-September), Gamtan (opened November 2024), Kimchi Mama (opened August 2025), and Myung Ga II Minipress (opening Sept 22), have also introduced new restaurants and expanded their presence in Singapore, offering diverse Korean culinary experiences.

articles.title: Leftovers: Cheez-It Adds Crunch For Biggest Innovation In Years
articles.author: Food Dive
articles.summary: Kellanova is launching Cheez-It Crunch, a new line of 3D-shaped cheese crackers, which is the brand's biggest innovation in three years. The launch includes three flavors: Kick'n Nacho Cheese, Zesty Jalapeño Cheddar and Sharp White Cheddar, with staggered availability starting in October at 7-Eleven and nationwide in January 2026.

articles.title: Samsung rivals Apple iPhone 17 with £23 Galaxy S25 deal and £370 giveaway
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 FE, a new smartphone in its Galaxy series, positioning it as a budget-friendly alternative to the iPhone 17. The S25 FE boasts features like a 6.7" AMOLED display, enhanced AI functions, and is available from Samsung and Amazon starting at £649, with promotional offers including free tech bundles from Sky Mobile.

articles.title: 42 Fun, Practical, And/Or Underrated Things
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Wet n Wild introduced a lipstick formulated with vitamins and macadamia. Hanni launched a showerless shave gel made with cactus water and glycerin. Mielle launched a rosemary mint strengthening edge gel enriched with biotin, coconut oil, and babassu oil. Capri Blue released a Volcano-scented multipurpose cleaner. Aerflo introduced an Aerflo System that lets you carbonate water on the go.

articles.title: NDTV Tech360 debuts on September 13: To reimagine the tech narrative
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: NDTV is launching a new multimedia tech platform called Tech360 on September 13. The platform aims to provide a new perspective on technology stories and their influence on our lives, and will be available across NDTV 24x7, NDTV Profit, and NDTV Digital.

articles.title: Latest cool stuff: Samsung's ‘black magic' folding phone, Coopers' ‘terrible' new beer and mind-blowing $5200 Fender Stratocaster
articles.author: Ben Graham
articles.summary: Samsung has released the Flip7 foldable smartphone and the Watch8 smartwatch with new health-tracking features. Coopers has launched its first non-alcoholic beer, Coopers Zero. Wild Turkey has introduced Master's Keep Beacon, a new deluxe bourbon. Fender has released the American Ultra Luxe series, modern refinements of classic guitars.

articles.title: Myntra partners with Vellvette Lifestyle, the makers of SUGAR Cosmetics, to unveil Molten Beauty
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra and SUGAR Cosmetics have strategically partnered to launch Molten Beauty, a new-age skincare and makeup brand targeting Gen Z. The brand features products that hydrate, protect, soothe, brighten, and plump. Molten Beauty will be available on Myntra and moltenbeauty.com, with delivery starting in 30 minutes via Myntra's M-Now service.

articles.title: Hapbee Strengthens Leadership Team with Key Appointments; Provides Update on Shares-for-Debt Settlement
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Hapbee is implementing new leadership roles to expedite its product strategy and accelerate product deployments. This suggests a focus on launching or updating products or services more rapidly.

articles.title: EssayService and the Five Reasons Students Trust It With Their Work - The Roanoke-Chowan News-Herald EssayService and the Five Reasons It Hits the Mark
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: EssayService is introduced as a platform providing writing assistance, emphasizing human-written content and expert writers. The service offers transparent pricing, direct communication with writers, and features like originality checks to ensure academic integrity. EssayService aims to deliver reliable, high-quality support while respecting student budgets.

articles.title: How to use Nano Banana, Google DeepMind's viral image editing tool
articles.author: Jaspreet Bindra
articles.summary: Google introduces Nano Banana, an AI tool integrated into the Gemini app, designed to help product marketers with visual content creation. Nano Banana maintains brand consistency across campaigns, executes complex edits using natural language, and creates realistic lifestyle scenarios for products, enabling A/B testing and reducing the need for expensive photoshoots.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A preorder, Mega Evolutions, and gameplay explained
articles.author: Christian Wait
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching Pokémon Legends: Z-A worldwide on October 16, 2025, for both Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2, with an enhanced edition for the new hardware. The game features real-time battles, Wild Zones, and the return of Mega Evolution. Preordering offers bonuses like a Mystery Gift Ralts holding a Gardevoirite Stone and 100 Poké Balls.

articles.title: 2025 Hyundai Sonata N Line FWD
articles.author: Debbie Nalley
articles.summary: Hyundai is launching the 2025 Sonata N Line FWD, a performance-oriented midsize sedan. It features a 2.5-liter turbocharged engine producing 290 horsepower, paired with an eight-speed dual-clutch transmission, and includes aggressive styling like 19-inch alloy wheels and a panoramic sunroof.

articles.title: Highly rated 'magic' spot cleaner the bestselling Amazon gadgets and home organisation buys that WILL change your life this spring
articles.author: ANDREA ROBERTSON
articles.summary: Amazon is offering significant discounts on various new products and services for spring cleaning and home organization. These include the Eureka J12 Ultra Robot Vacuum Cleaner and Mop at 75% off, the BISSELL SpotClean Portable Carpet & Upholstery Cleaner, and various home organization products like the Feshory 42 Pack Airtight Food Storage Container Set. Additionally, deals are available on linen sets and towels, such as the Linen House Nara 400TC Bamboo/Cotton White Queen Quilt Cover Set.

articles.title: 33 Products With Such High Ratings It's Almost Obnoxious
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Essence mascara makes lashes longer and fuller. Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Bum Bum Cream hydrates skin with cupuaçu butter, coconut oil, and açai oil. Melissa & Doug ice cream counter brings fun. Liquid I.V. Hydration packets contains three times the electrolytes of a typical sports drink. The Pink Stuff cleans various surfaces. Cerave eye repair cream revitalizes skin with ceramides and hyaluronic acid. Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil erases blackheads. Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop cleans floors. NYX butter gloss offers shiny lips. COSRX's Snail Mucin Repairing Essence hydrates skin. Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner removes spills.

articles.title: AI Photo Edit: Nano Banana Magic & Gemini Updates!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google introduced Nano Banana, a new image generation and editing model within the Gemini app. This product offers advanced editing capabilities such as maintaining consistent subject appearance across edits and style transfer, allowing users to apply the aesthetic of one image to another. Nano Banana represents a shift towards personalized and dynamically generated visual content.

articles.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond finally gets a release date
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo has released a new trailer. This trailer suggests an upcoming product or service announcement from the company.

articles.title: Nintendo Direct September 2025: All the news, reveals, and trailers
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo showcased new game announcements during its latest Nintendo Direct event, which lasted 60 minutes. The event introduced upcoming games from Nintendo.

articles.title: The Rise of Whole-Body Deodorants and Whether You Really Need Them
articles.author: Newsgram Desk
articles.summary: Lume started the whole-body deodorant trend in 2018, followed by major companies like Unilever (Dove, Rexona, Sure, Lynx) and Procter & Gamble (Old Spice, Native, Secret) launching their own versions. These companies are adapting to consumer trends by using influencers, investing in natural ingredients, and offering low-cost solutions to meet the increasing demand for whole-body odor control.
